item.title: Minneapolis ICE shooting live updates: Vance says it was 'tragedy of her own making'
item.description: Tensions are flaring in Minneapolis after an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer fatally shot a 37-year-old woman on Wednesday.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Senate advances war powers resolution to rein in Trump on Venezuela
item.description: The resolution narrowly advanced with a vote of 52-47.

item.title: WATCH: Dogs enjoying the game of tetherball
item.description: Two dogs are charming the internet with their backyard game.

item.title: WATCH: This man is using a backpack to help get dogs adopted
item.description: Bryan Reisberg is on a mission to help shelter dogs get adopted by using his special backpack.
